titles.title: Honoring Civil Servants Killed in the Line of Duty Act
Honoring Civil Servants Killed in the Line of Duty Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase death gratuities and funeral allowances for Federal employees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Honoring Civil Servants Killed in the Line of Duty Act
This bill increases benefits to survivors of federal employees who die in the line of duty.
Specifically, the bill increases the death benefit for federal employees from $10,000 to $100,000 and increases the funeral benefit from $800 to $8,800. Both amounts must be adjusted annually for inflation. The bill also excludes the death benefit from gross income for purposes of federal taxation.
